thread.title: Mr A Foster
thread.title_full: CoolFrames.com reviewed by Mr A Foster

author: Mr A Foster
title: Mr A Foster
text:
Very helpful staff Eli and Mia at customer services.
CoolFrames helped me find a reasonably rare Holco OnGuard frame.
Be warned of United Kingdom customs for international delivery through, although the frame only cost £49 pounds, the customs wanted £12 and ParcelForce wanted £8 handling charge. That's nearly 40% of the cost of the frames.
I will use CoolFrames again for hard to find frames in the UK.
Cheers.
